title: The AI CMO: Marketing’s New Powerhouse for Strategy in 2024
excerpt: Flable AI explores why the next marketing superstar is a Chief Marketing Officer with AI in their toolkit. Insights, frameworks, and winning mindsets.
content:
Today’s most influential marketing organizations are being led by AI-empowered CMOs—visionaries fluent in both creativity and data-driven execution.

Why AI matters for the CMO role:

  • Rapid decision making with instantly personalized insights
  • Bespoke campaign optimization, 24/7
  • Strong brand resonance powered by predictive models

Flable’s Playbook: Our consulting work has shown that organizations embracing ‘AI CMO’ principles see faster growth, more accurate attribution, and higher customer retention.
Modern marketing isn’t about automation for its own sake—it’s about cultivating agile, AI-enhanced leadership at the top.

Flable’s Take: In the next five years, top-performing enterprises will expect their CMO to orchestrate people, AI, and platforms as one seamless system.

attribution.sourceTitle: How AI Is Changing the Role of the CMO
